title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Thing
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: Gandhi
oscars_won_details: Best Screenplay, Written Directly for the Screen
description: The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.

title: The King of Comedy
description: A passionate yet delusional aspiring comic kidnaps his idol in a desperate attempt to take the spotlight.

title: Tootsie
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.

title: Fanny and Alexander
description: Two young Swedish children in the 1900s experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

title: Poltergeist
description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
description: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Sophie's Choice
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

title: An Officer and a Gentleman
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.

title: The Verdict
description: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.

title: First Blood
description: A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.

title: Tron
description: A computer hacker is abducted into the digital world and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.

title: The Dark Crystal
description: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
description: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

title: Conan the Barbarian
description: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his tribe and his parents whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his warriors when he was a boy.

title: The Secret of NIMH
description: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

title: 48 Hrs.
description: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

title: Missing
oscars_won_details: Best Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: When an American writer disappears during the Chilean coup of 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

title: Victor/Victoria
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Original Song Score and Its Adaptation
description: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

title: Diner
description: A group of college-age buddies struggle with their imminent passage into adulthood in 1959 Baltimore.

title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
description: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.

title: Koyaanisqatsi
description: A collection of expertly photographed phenomena with no conventional plot, exploring the effect of humanity on nature.

title: Fitzcarraldo
description: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

title: The World According to Garp
description: A struggling young writer, surrounded by eccentric characters, gets inspired by his mother, a feminist icon.

title: Rocky III
description: Rocky faces the ultimate challenge from a powerful new contender, and must turn to a former rival to help regain his throne.

title: The Year of Living Dangerously
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: Creepshow
description: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales inspired by the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.

title: My Favorite Year
description: A dissolute matinee idol is slated to appear on a popular live TV comedy show in 1954, and a junior comedy writer is given the job of keeping him sober.

title: The Last Unicorn
description: A beautiful unicorn sets out on a quest to find others like her after learning she may be the last of her kind.

title: Dead Men Don't Wear Plaid
description: Juliet Forrest hires a private eye to track down her father's killer, leading him into a complex plot involving cheese molds and Nazis.

title: Annie
description: A young orphan is invited to spend a week with a billionaire, but her happy new life is threatened by the orphanage's cruel headmistress.

title: The Man from Snowy River
description: A young man fights to prove his worth as a mountain horseman and win the heart of a rancher's daughter.

title: Class of 1984
description: A new teacher at a troubled inner-city high school faces off against a gang of violent punks dominating the school.

title: Deathtrap
description: A washed-up playwright plans to kill a student and steal his brilliant script.

title: Night Shift
description: A timid morgue attendant is dragged into a wild prostitution scheme by his new coworker.

title: White Dog
description: A trainer attempts to retrain a vicious dog that has been conditioned to attack Black people.

title: Tenebrae
description: An American writer in Rome is stalked by a serial killer bent on harassing him while killing all people associated with his work on his latest book.

title: Veronika Voss
description: A sports reporter meets a faded UFA starlet who is kept under the influence of morphine by her doctor.

title: Chan Is Missing
description: Two cabbies search San Francisco's Chinatown for a man who stole their money.

title: Eating Raoul
description: A quaint, prudish couple in need of money lure swingers into their apartment to kill and rob them.

title: The Plague Dogs
description: Two dogs escape from a laboratory and are hunted as possible carriers of the bubonic plague.

title: One from the Heart
description: A Las Vegas couple breaks up on the 4th of July, and they both go out into the night seeking new romance.

title: Cat People
description: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her Galloping lust transforms her into a black leopard.

title: The Beastmaster
description: A sword-and-sorcery hero fights an evil wizard with his animal allies.

title: Tex
description: Two brothers growing up in rural Oklahoma struggle to find a new life for themselves after their mother dies and their father leaves them.

title: Personal Best
description: Two women track stars compete for a spot on the 1980 U.S. Olympic team and fall in love.

title: Tempest
description: A successful New York architect undergoing a mid-life crisis brings his daughter to a Greek island and meets a free-spirited woman.

title: A Midsummer Night's Sex Comedy
description: A wacky inventor and his wife invite two other couples for a weekend party at a romantic summer house in the 1900s countryside.

title: Shoot the Moon
description: A bitter, separation and divorce between two writers, George and Faith Dunlap, destroy their family.

title: The Draughtsman's Contract
description: An artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.
